actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to declare a portion of the Delaware River in Burlington County, N.J., nonnavigable.

summary.text: Declares a portion of the Delaware River in Burlington County, New Jersey, as nonnavigable water within the meaning of the Constitution and laws of the United States.

titles.title: A bill to declare a portion of the Delaware River in Burlington County, N.J., nonnavigable.
